    Interface and Description
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.proxy.SenderThreadListener
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description

    No longer used/needed (FilePlugins were replaced with Forced Browse). It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.BrowserDialog
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.network.ByteVector
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.

    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.

    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.PolicyParam
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.PopupDeleteMenu
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.history.PopupMenuAlert
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.PopupMenuDeleteHistory
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.PopupMenuEmbeddedBrowser
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.PopupMenuPurgeHistory
    Replaced by PopupMenuPurgeHistory. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.PopupMenuResend
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.PopupMenuResendSites
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.PopupPurgeMenu
    Replaced by PopupMenuPurgeSites. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.zaproxy.zap.httputils.RequestUtils
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.proxy.SenderThread
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.proxy.StreamForwarder
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.zaproxy.clientapi.core.ClientApi.activeScanSite(String)
    As of release 2.0.0, replaced by ascan.scan(url, recurse) and polling ascan.status()
    org.zaproxy.clientapi.core.ClientApi.activeScanUrl(String)
    As of release 2.0.0, replaced by ascan.scan(url, recurse) and polling ascan.status()
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionHook.addSiteMapListner(SiteMapListener)
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.MainMenuBar.getMenuFileSave()
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.network.HttpRequestHeader.getSecure()
    Replaced by HttpRequestHeader.isSecure(). It will be removed in a future release.
    org.zaproxy.clientapi.core.ClientApi.loadSession(String)
    As of release 2.0.0, replaced by core.loadSession(name);
    org.zaproxy.clientapi.core.ClientApi.newSession()
    As of release 2.0.0, replaced by core.newSession("");
    org.zaproxy.clientapi.core.ClientApi.newSession(String)
    As of release 2.0.0, replaced by core.newSession(name);
    org.zaproxy.clientapi.core.ClientApi.saveSession(String)
    As of release 2.0.0, replaced by core.saveSession(name);
    org.zaproxy.clientapi.core.ClientApi.spiderUrl(String)
    As of release 2.0.0, replaced by spider.scan(url) and polling spider.status()
    org.zaproxy.clientapi.core.ClientApi.stopZap()
    As of release 2.0.0, replaced by core.shutdown()
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.SessionDialog(Frame, boolean, String)
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release. Use the constructor SessionDialog.SessionDialog(Frame parent, boolean modal, String title, String rootName) instead.
